main event: A civilian observed a luminous object in the sky from his bedroom window, initially thought to be a star, for about 1 hour and 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object moved toward the northeast at a faster speed than a normal star,The observer tracked the object for the entire duration of the sighting,The object's disappearance was reported to the Investigative Officer,It was described as being as large as an aircraft and yellowish like a star,The investigation concluded it was likely a weather balloon released in the area.
sighted object: a bright object resembling a star
witness description: a 35-year-old male from Falls Church, VA, described as critical and reliable
